default.description: Returns the trading volume of the last 24 hours.

totalUSDVolume.description: The total trade volume in terms of USD.

tokenAmount.description: The trading volume for a particular token.

lastUSDPrice.description: The price in USD of the token at the most recent trade.

USDValue.description: The corresponding trading volume in USD for a particular token.

startDate.description: The start date and time for the volume presented.

get.title: Trading Volume History
get.summary: Request information regarding the trading volume for a specific date. The request returns the overall trading volume details for all tokens in USD as well as the trading volume per token.

parameters.name: Year
parameters.description: The year of the specific trading volume request date - in this case 2020.

parameters.name: Month
parameters.description: The month of the specific trading volume request date - in this case 01 (January).

parameters.name: Day
parameters.description: The day of the specific trading volume request date - in this case 01 (1st of a month).

default.description: Returns the overall trading volume details for all tokens in USD as well as the trading volume per trading pair.

totalUSDVolume.description: The total trade volume in terms of USD.

tokenAmount.description: The trading volume for a particular token.

USDValue.description: The corresponding trading volume in USD for a particular token.

startDate.description: The start date and time for the volume presented.

endDate.description: The end date and time for the volume presented.

get.title: Volume ranking by token
get.summary: This returns a user ranking by trading volume for a chosen token. If the parameters startDate and endDate are provided, the ranking includes only trading volume within that window of time. All volumes are quoted in ETH.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency relating to the requested trading volume information.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date and time (Unix timestamp in milliseconds) for which the trade volumes are requested. If startDate and endDate are not provided, it returns the volume ranking if all time.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date and time (Unix timestamp in milliseconds) for which the trade volumes are requested. If startDate and endDate are not provided, it returns the volume ranking if all time.

default.description: Returns a ranked output of all the trading volumes for a given crypto currency. All the Volumes are quoted in ETH.

amount.description: The trading volume for the address

get.title: User ranking by volume
get.summary: This returns a user ranking by overall trading volume quoted in USD. If the parameters startDate and endDate are provided, the ranking includes only trading volume within that window of time.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date and time (Unix timestamp in milliseconds) for which the trade volumes are requested. If startDate and endDate are not provided, it returns the volume ranking if all time.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date and time (Unix timestamp in milliseconds) for which events are requested.If startDate and endDate are not provided, it returns the volume ranking if all time.

default.description: Ranked output of all trading volumes for all the tokens.

USDValue.description: The trading volume for the address quoted in USD.

get.title: Get Fee Rate
get.summary: Return current fee rate for a given address. This rate is dependent on the trading volume of the user.

parameters.description: This nonce which used to provide the time until which this nonce is valid. It is presented as seconds since epoch.
parameters.name: nonce

parameters.description: The signature obtained by signing the nonce with your private ethereum key.
parameters.name: signature

get.title: User 30-day volume
get.summary: Request information regarding the trading volume of a specific address for the last 30 days. The request returns the overall trading volume details for all tokens in USD as well as the trading volume per token. Results are cached for 60 minutes.

parameters.description: This nonce which used to provide the time until which this nonce is valid. It is presented as seconds since epoch.
parameters.name: nonce

parameters.description: The signature obtained by signing the nonce with your private ethereum key.
parameters.name: signature

default.description: Returns the trading volume of the last 30 days for a specific address. The request returns the overall trading volume details for all tokens in USD as well as the trading volume per trading pair. Results are cached for 60 minutes.

totalUSDVolume.description: The total trade volume in terms of USD.

tokenAmount.description: The trading volume for a particular token.

USDValue.description: The corresponding trading volume in USD for a particular token.

startDate.description: The start date and time for the volume presented.

endDate.description: The end date and time for the volume presented.

get.title: User 24-hours volume
get.summary: Request information regarding the trading volume of a specific address for the last 24 hours. The request returns the overall trading volume details for all tokens in USD as well as the trading volume per token. Results are cached for 2 minutes.

parameters.description: This nonce which used to provide the time until which this nonce is valid. It is presented as seconds since epoch.
parameters.name: nonce

parameters.description: The signature obtained by signing the nonce with your private ethereum key.
parameters.name: signature

default.description: Returns the overall trading volume details of a specific address for all tokens in USD as well as the trading volume per trading pair fot the last 24 hours.

totalUSDVolume.description: The total trade volume in terms of USD.

tokenAmount.description: The trading volume for a particular token.

USDValue.description: The corresponding trading volume in USD for a particular token.

default.description: Returns the amount of time remaining until the batch is posted to Ethereum.

estimatedTime.description: The number of seconds until the batch is sent to be processed and broadcast to the blockchain.

averageTime.description: The configured number of seconds between batches.

finalisedBatchPendingConfirmation.description: True if the previous batch has been created but still pending confirmation on the blockchain.'

ethAddress.description: Ethereum public address of the user.

starkKey.description: The Stark public key of the user.

post.title: Submit Order
post.summary: This authenticated endpoint is used to submit an order.

parameters.name: Symbol
parameters.description: The market trading pair in deversifi format i.e BASE:QUOTE

parameters.name: Symbol
parameters.description: The market trading pair in deversifi format i.e BASE:QUOTE

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description: Date of the last trade returned.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: Limit of trades that will be returned. With a maximum limit of 1000.

get.title: Orderbook
get.summary: This public endpoint allows to keep track of the state of DeversiFi orderbooks on a price aggregated basis with customizable precision. Raw books can be retrieved by using precision R0.

parameters.name: Symbol
parameters.description: Specifies the trading pair.

parameters.name: Precision
parameters.description: Set the price aggregation level. Adjust the precision by entering a value between P0-P4. Raw books can be retrieved by using precision R0. Use one of the following values - P0, P1, P2, P3, P4, R0.

default.description: Returns a specific order and allows you to keep track of the state of Deversifi order books on a price aggregated basis with customizable precision.

Price.description: Specifies the price level for trading.

Count.description: Number of orders at that price level.

Amount.description: Total amount available at that price level.

get.title: Tickers
get.summary: The ticker endpoint provides a high level overview of the state of the market for a specified pair. It shows the current best bid and ask, the last traded price, as well as information on the daily volume and price movement over the last day.

parameters.name: symbols
parameters.description: Specify the trading pair. A list of symbols can also be provided. In order to retrieve the results of all trading pairs, the symbol “ALL” should be used. symbols = ["ZRX:USDT", "ETH:USDT"]

default.description: Returns the current best bid and ask, the last traded price, as well as information on the daily volume and price movement over the last day.

symbol.description: The symbol of the requested trading pair.

bid.description: Price of the most recent highest bid.

bid_size.description: Sum of the 25 highest bid sizes.

ask.description: Price of the most recent lowest ask price.

ask_size.description: Sum of the 25 lowest ask sizes.

daily_change.description: Amount that the last price has changed since yesterday.

daily_change_relative.description: Relative price change since yesterday (x 100 for percentage change).

get.title: Candles
get.summary: The Candles endpoint provides OCHL (Open, Close, High, Low) and volume data for the specified funding currency or trading pair. The endpoint returns the last 100 candles by default, but a limit and a start and/or end timestamp can be specified.

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description: Specify time frame. Available values are '1m', '5m', '15m', '30m', '1h', '3h', '6h','12h', '1D','7D', '14D', '1M'.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Specify the trading pair for which information is required.

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: Section for more precise selection. Available values - "last" or "hist"

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of results.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Filter start (time since epoch in ms).

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Filter end (time since epoch in ms).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Determines if the results should be sorted. If = 1, it sorts results returned with old > new.

default.description: Returns the last 100 candles by default, but a limit and a start and/or end timestamp can be specified.

open.description: First execution during the time frame.

close.description: Last execution during the time frame.

high.description: Highest execution during the time frame.

low.description: Lowest execution during the time frame.

volume.description: Quantity of symbol traded within the time frame.

ws.title: WS Candles
ws.summary: The Candles websocket provides OCHL (Open, Close, High, Low) and volume data for the specified trading pair. The endpoint returns initially a snapshot of candles and subsequently sends candle updates.

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description: Specify time frame. Available values are '1m', '5m', '15m', '30m', '1h', '3h', '6h','12h', '1D','7D', '14D', '1M'.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Specify the trading pair for which information is required.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Section for more precise selection. Available values - "trade"

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Specify client event type. Available values - "subscribe"

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Type of channel to subscribe to. Available values - "candles"

default.description: Returns the last 100 candles by default, but a limit and a start and/or end timestamp can be specified.

chanId.description: Number representing subscription. (First element of root array)

open.description: First execution during the time frame.

close.description: Last execution during the time frame.

high.description: Highest execution during the time frame.

low.description: Lowest execution during the time frame.

volume.description: Quantity of symbol traded within the time frame.

ws.title: WS Ticker
ws.summary: The ticker endpoint provides a high level overview of the state of the market for a specified pair. It shows the current best bid and ask, the last traded price, as well as information on the daily volume and price movement over the last day.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Specify the trading pair. A list of symbols can also be provided. In order to retrieve the results of all trading pairs, the symbol “ALL” should be used. symbols = ["MKR:ETH", "ETH:USDT"]

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Specify client event type. Available values - "subscribe"

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Type of channel to subscribe to. Available values - "ticker"

default.description: Returns the current best bid and ask, the last traded price, as well as information on the daily volume and price movement over the last day.

chanId.description: Number representing subscription. (First element of root array)

bid.description: Price of the most recent highest bid.

bid_size.description: Sum of the 25 highest bid sizes.

ask.description: Price of the most recent lowest ask price.

ask_size.description: Sum of the 25 lowest ask sizes.

daily_change.description: Amount that the last price has changed since yesterday.

daily_change_relative.description: Relative price change since yesterday (x 100 for percentage change).

ws.title: WS Orderbook
ws.summary: This public endpoint allows to keep track of the state of DeversiFi orderbooks.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Specify the trading pair. A list of symbols can also be provided. In order to retrieve the results of all trading pairs, the symbol “ALL” should be used. symbols = ["MKR:ETH", "ETH:USDT"]

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Specify client event type. Available values - "subscribe"

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Type of channel to subscribe to. Available values - "book"

default.description: Returns a specific order and allows you to keep track of the state of Deversifi order books on a price aggregated basis with customizable precision.

chanId.description: Number representing subscription. (First element of root array)

Price.description: Specifies the price level for trading.

Count.description: Number of orders at that price level.

Amount.description: Total amount available at that price level.
